name: Tango Assassins
description:
The mob leader Martina has barricaded herself into El Nido del Buitre Mansion.

Martina does have a weak spot: She's unable to resist good tango.

Infiltrate to the mansion and give her the performance of your life!

This Game was made for a 5 day game jam by Patrick Milvi, Inan Evin, Emmi Kärnä & Jenni Varila
